channel.title: Hello
channel.description:
I wanna know how i can add items to my shop keeper and stuff
also i wanna move my shops to edgeville!
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=20U6GPN8
thats the client im using....

item.title: Hello
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“eeevon, post:1, topic:291947”]I wanna know how i can add items to my shop keeper and stuff

also i wanna move my shops to edgeville![/quote]

That would be a server related question. Not a client question.

But, anyways…To move the shops, move the npcs that open the shops (autospawn.cfg/spawn.cfg…Whatever you use to spawn npcs.)
To add items or change the items…(shops.cfg…Or…Whatever you use for shops…)

Read full topic
